Method.name: ReportStatus
Method.Description: Writes the status file with the specified contents
Method.Implementation: // write to cconsole.log do ##class(%SYS.System).WriteToConsoleLog(Contents,,Level) // file output set fs=##class(%File).%New(StatusFile) do fs.Open("WN") do fs.WriteLine($CASE(Level,0:"OK",1:"WARNING",2:"ERROR",3:"FATAL")_" - "_Contents) do fs.Close()

Method.name: Freeze
Method.Description: Freezes the Write Daemon, verifying and flagging success with a file

Method.name: Thaw
Method.Description: Thaws the Write Daemon, verifying and flagging success with a file
